{'year': '2022', 'genre': ''}.response: Our API provides data on the latest anime series and episodes from the year specified. {'year': '2022', 'genre': 'action'}.response: Our database includes an extensive list of action anime from the year 2022. These titles range from battle-focused shounen hits to dark fantasy adventures, showcasing a variety of artistic styles and narrative themes. Audience reviews and ratings sourced from popular anime forums and databases will also be available to help users gauge the general reception of the series.
